extendedInfo.description: are you looking for excitement and challenge generator Break Break its one of the best excitement and challenge generator *Break Break is that are combination which offer both Fun and challenge *this is a very addictive game and you will play it again and again ******** *its simple,fun *the best thing about this game that you will keep playing and playing to achieve the highest score and challenge your friends with it ************** Swipe your finger across the screen to break the obstacle, and the way to start get more score is to Break 3 obstacle or more in one Swipe and be careful of dynamite the are explosive and they will bring you back to the first stage and make you lose your advantage ************ Key Feature *craziness speed *unlimited score *Four Amazing Game Items Help You in Game *Four Cool Background With Different Music *Another three New Obstacle type *****************
